H0.text: Which Christian festival day is held 40 days after the resurrection of Christ . Ascension Day

H1.text: Which Christian festival day is held 40 days after the resurrection of Christ . Easter Monday

H2.text: Which Christian festival day is held 40 days after the resurrection of Christ . Trinity Sunday

H3.text: Which Christian festival day is held 40 days after the resurrection of Christ . Pentecost

A4.text: Pentecost is a Christian holiday that takes place on the 49th day (50th day when inclusive counting is used) after Easter.

A5.text: The fifty days from Easter Sunday to Pentecost Sunday may also be called Eastertide.
